website_summaries.verdict: If you're a fan of firmer neck pillows, this is a useful choice. Extremely versatile and convenient.
pros: Molds to the optimal neck size for each user
cons: A handful of consumers note that this pillow is very firm, although it may soften up a bit over time

customer_reviews.title: This is a great neck pillow because they are usually too fat in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great neck pillow because they are usually too fat in the back of the neck and push my head too far forward. I like the removable insert to make it thinner in the back. The only thing missing is for it to have something to button it closed it in the front , because that would help it not slip if I fall asleep and also for putting over my luggage handle when traveling. If it had that, it would be perfect. Excellent price, though, and perhaps I'll sew something on myself eventually. Most of these pillows are too hard, but the memory foam is just right.
customer_reviews.author: K Medlar

customer_reviews.title: Too Soft, No Support
customer_reviews.text: Purchased so both of us could have a pillow while watching TV. We have been very happy with our old pillow as it contains firm polyurethane foam. This pillow offers no support because it is too soft. Also, if leaned on, the shape distorts (now I know why some pillows come with front fasteners). Our old pillow is firm enough not to distort under normal use. Otherwise, the overall quality of the fabric and workmanship are satisfactory. If it wasn't so cheap I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Necked out in comfort
customer_reviews.text: This was so much lighter than I anticipated it being, since memory foam is usually heavy and dense. However, it is firm and cushy, like you would expect from a memory foam neck pillow. The outside velour is super soft and touchable, and I haven't had any issues with it itching, rubbing, or otherwise irritating my skin. Easy to adjust the back, if needed, though I haven't needed to. It squishes just enough that my neck is positioned well on the seat back. I do find that it gets a little 'flat' on whichever side my head is lolling after awhile, but it's still more comfortable than without. Quality neck pillow at a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Melaina Lara

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for long flights. It did come with a removable insert as seen in the picture which is a very nice feature to have. I took the removable insert out when I sat in a coach class recently because the seating position was relatively straight up so reducing the thickness of the pillow made me felt far more comfortable compared with a conventional U-shaped pillow I used to have, which usually pushes my head forward. The elastic strap is handy when carrying the pillow around on my carry-on bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tellmoten

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow Lasted Many Years
customer_reviews.text: Great Pillow, I've owned this since June 2014. Has gotten me through many international flights, and even used a a neck pillow at home after surgery, and as an emergency hotel pillow when the ones at the hotel were terrible. Had just the right support for me and a life saver on my 20 hour flight. Sadly I have to replace it because my puppy decided it would make a fun chew toy, but nearly 5 years out of it was great! Having to buy a new one for my next long flight!
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Gaijin

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: - There is a small cushion in the back that can be removed to make the back flat. - Very comfortable Con's: - The strap ripped off fairly easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This was actually smaller than expected. Have purchased a few travel neck pillows and this one was smaller by far. Nice gray color and the little handle is not bad but can easily break. This is not for me personally but I am sure someone else would like it. Won't purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Works well & great at the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this at home while watching tv or reading to support my neck. It has helped to alleviate pain I was having in my shoulders. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: TripleD

customer_reviews.title: I love this neck pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love this neck pillow. The only reason I am taking a star off is because of the stretchy band on the back. It is great because you can hang it on your luggage's handle. Unfortunately, the stretchy string starts to stretch out and starts to rip off. I have used this on one trip, which was to Hawaii. I will it had a button closure on the front.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so good...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not too thrilled about this neck pillow. The "Memory Foam" just compresses completely when any weight is applied to it (as if it's not dense enough to be effective), and the overall shape is sort of diamond-like, rather than tubular. Also it's the old style memory foam which retains heat like crazy - so you'll be glad the cover is washable (which was a big buying-point), because you're going to sweat all over it. Overall, underwhelmed.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Coward

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone who travels and likes to sleep / relax on trips!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for travel. You don't realize how necessary they are until you own one. I would borrow my sisters for my travels but decided to purchase my own. My favorite feature is zipper that allows you to wash the outside portion. Would recommend to anyone who travels and likes to sleep / relax on trips!
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really expected to love this neck pillow, but for me, it was not comfortable. It was too thick and didn't cradle my head enough to make me comfortable. For me, it was too hard. I expected that it would get softer once the heat of my neck/head registered on the memory foam, but it did not. When I would use it, it would put way too much pressure at the base of my neck that I would wake up with a headache or a crick in my neck. I Do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Fur Kid Mom

customer_reviews.title: I thought the memory foam would be nice because I have a regular memory foam pillow and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent neck pillow. I thought the memory foam would be nice because I have a regular memory foam pillow and love it. The problem for me is that it doesn't keep my head propped up because the memory foam compresses so it's almost like it isn't there. I think if I were to buy another one I would buy a regular neck pillow rather than a memory foam one. Your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H.

customer_reviews.title: Stiffer Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are very good for the person on a long plane or car journey. This pillow, purchased at the same time as one of a different color, was considerably stiffer than it's differently-colored twin, and in fact was too firm for its purpose. It was a gift for a 10-year-old and the hope was that he would soften it to a firmness to his liking. That has happened, he has reported. Five stars would have been awarded if not for the very stiff filling.
customer_reviews.author: Holabird My Past

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is a good neck pillow for the price. It is dense memory foam...so for those looking for something super soft and squishy, this isn’t for you. I have one that is full little beans, but it was too squishy to use leaning against the window of the plane, this one works much better for me. I also did not notice a strong smell like other reviews have mentioned. The packaging advises you to let it air out for a few days which worked fine for me. As an added bonus I can sit on it to relieve pressure on my tail bone when I do ab exercises. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Mel Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The price is honestly about the same as what you would find in retail stores. The memory foam is way too thick. I am tempted to cut some of it off. I could not use it in the long airplane rides because of its thickness. My neck was placed in an awkward uncomfortable way when I tried using it. The only way this will be comfortable is if I was in a car or van where I can't lean my head on the seat. This would be perfect...It is not practical in all instances.
customer_reviews.author: r.s.l

customer_reviews.title: I loved the soft feel of this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I loved the soft feel of this pillow. However, the whole thing was way too stiff to be comfortable. The middle piece pushed my neck so far away from my seat that it was uncomfortable. I could squish it for temporary relief, but it quickly returned to its original shape. The little strap made it easy to clip to my backpack, but it was a total waste of space. I ended up trying to use it as a regular pillow on my 16-hour flight.
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is almost perfect! It’ll it was just a little thicker it would be. But for price and comfort- I love it
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing Trip
customer_reviews.text: First off I want to say thanks for giving me the opportunity to sleep like a baby on my way to Abu Dhabi. I've never been in a long flight like that before and this travel pillow was perfect for a long relaxing flight. Stays soft even after you wash it. Great pillow. I wonder if they make any for children. My wife want to get one for my sons. Definitely recommend this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Jose T.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for awhile and it’s really great for long flights def has prevented my neck from being sore . Since it’s memory foam it’s also really great because if I want to stuff it in a bag I can squish it and it fits and reforms shape after.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella DAmico

customer_reviews.title: Very nice firm neck pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very firm which is what I was looking for. I like that the insert is removable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I felt like this memory foam was a bit stiff at times
customer_reviews.text: This neck pillow is just okay. After having this memory foam, I actually prefer the other type of neck pillow with the little beads in it. I felt like this memory foam was a bit stiff at times, which could work great for someone who prefers a more stiff support! Overall, It works fine, and I will continue using it, but my next neck pillow purchase will be the traditional type with the little beads.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna K.

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow, but buy a few weeks before travel to avoid smell from foam!
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow! I only just received it so I can’t speak to durability yet. The one thing I would note is that there is a strong smell from the foam. I bought the pillow two days before my flight and aired it out outside, but the smell is still pretty strong. It would be ideal to purchase this a few weeks before your trip to avoid the strong odor, especially if you are sensitive to smells!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and convenient to wash.
customer_reviews.text: My mom had bought my father this neck pillow at a store, but it was the last one and she was unable to find another. Of course, I go to Amazon and there it is! She loves it and uses it every night while watching TV in bed. The removable cover means even if she falls asleep and drools all over it, she can wash it and keep it smelling good ;)
customer_reviews.author: C H

customer_reviews.title: Had to sew the seam together only 3 days after receiving it.
customer_reviews.text: We already returned one of these pillows because it arrived split at the seam. So we ordered a new one and it arrived with no splits (or at least no noticeable ones). 3 days later, we found a split in the seam. We sewed it together and reinforced it and it's fine now. The only issue is that the inside materials got kind of stuck in the zipper so now we won't be able to open it again if we need to.
customer_reviews.author: CrflConsmr

customer_reviews.title: Contours to your neck perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Material on the outside is soft and cozy. The inside has just the right amount of memory foam that molds to your individual neck perfectly. Bought another for my 90 year old Dad, and one for my Aunt who is in hospice.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Don't really use this for travelling, so much as for meditation which is much easier with good neck support.
customer_reviews.author: bzbee

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but Works (for 1 trip)
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for a trip with my fiancé. The first one's fabric pulled apart in the security line at the airport on the way to our destination. The second one made it to our destination before the fabric started coming off. The lmade it through the trip but we tossed them when we got home. Probably wouldn't buy them again because of their quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Joe

customer_reviews.title: The pillow is soft and comfortable however it is a little too soft and thin
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and have always decided this product was not for me, but on a recent trip to Asia in coach, i decided it was time to try one. The pillow is soft and comfortable however it is a little too soft and thin. When i tip my head to the side, the foam compresses and almost leaves it useless, it really needs another support to be really comfortable, ie the window or wall..
customer_reviews.author: Richard Waterman

customer_reviews.title: I EXPECTED IT TO BE SOFT AND COMFORTABLE, BUT IT WASN'T.  TOO THICK
customer_reviews.text: I DIDN'T LIKE HOW THE NECK SUPPORT WAS SO THICK AND RIGID. IT WOULD PROBABLY WORK OK FOR TRAVELING, BUT TO USE IT WHEN I LIE DOWN IN MY RECLINER AND READ, IT'S TOO BULKY AND RIGID.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made my trip to Vietnam EASY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this before a 17 hour flight to Vietnam and I slept like a baby. I woke up with only 3 hours left in the flight with NO NECK PAIN. I only wish I had this to China, my neck hurt for days, but no more! Yes, I'm that guy walking around the airport wearing it too, because it's just so comfortable to wear anywhere! Highly recommended. It's stiff enough to support your neck and very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Great memory foam neck pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this neck pillow for when I get migraines and have a stiff or sore neck. It is so soft and easy to clean! It's a great color and has a zipper!
customer_reviews.author: Fox1988

customer_reviews.title: Memory Foam Feels Real to Me
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my wife and I going on a long plane trip. They were half the price of cheap ones they sell in the airport, but I had seen several reviews saying it wasn't memory foam. That is not the case, that is definitely memory foam being used. It is a bit stiff at first like all memory foam, but will contour and soften up with use.
customer_reviews.author: Justin V.

customer_reviews.title: Great for international flights!
customer_reviews.text: I had people in the airport ask me where I got this, as they had the one with the beads and it does not work as well. This one has a strap to fit over your suitcase handle so you don't lose it, and it is firm but neck friendly for a long flight. I will take it again when I travel. I bought 2, so my husband and I would each have one. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This product is poorly made. I took it out of the package when I got it and the tags were falling off because it wasn't sewn well. The zipper is also coming undone. I've had to sew it because I didn't want to mess with returning the item but after having to sew it more than once, it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved me after surgery
customer_reviews.text: I used this pillow so I could lay on my left side after a surgery that was done inside my left ear. Sleeping on my right side all the time made me very uncomfortable. When I lay on my left side my ear fit perfectly into the "neck hole" and I could sleep comfortably without my ear hitting the bed. It was VERY important that I didn't touch that ear and without this pillow I do not know how I would have been able to make that 2 week recovery without going insane!!
customer_reviews.author: Ainsley

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but just a little too stiff for me
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for travel and my husband and I got two different colors from the same company. I bought the grey one and it is quite stiff. My husband bought a blue one and it is really soft. I prefer his pillow. Nice quality but just a little too stiff for me.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: ... squash it between my head and neck to be comfortable, or turn it sideways
customer_reviews.text: I had to fold this in half and squash it between my head and neck to be comfortable, or turn it sideways. It's still better than the microbeads or inflatables. You can squish it down into a pack sack (does not come with one) so it does not take up too much space for travel. The kind that buttons at the front is a better design, but this was not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe B Beebe

customer_reviews.title: Great neck pillow
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and material is so soft. Allows me to sleep on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nice add-on for a side sleeper to feel better on travel
customer_reviews.text: Not being familiar with neck pillows, I was brought to this item by the reviews. I am a side sleeper, so sleeping on a airplane is not convenient at all. This pillow help with easing into sleep. I ended up turning it and using the back portion for my face to lay on as it felt stiffer.
customer_reviews.author: Analysis and Perspective

customer_reviews.title: I suggest you get something else if you want something firm that provides support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and the only reason I rated it 2 stars was because he does still use it in combination with an older better neck pillow. But when it came it really was not firm at all, it is so soft and squishes down thinner then a pancake and doesn't provide any support and after 2 days it ripped at the seam so there is a large hole in it now.
customer_reviews.author: Whysteria

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how people use these. They're so ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how people use these. They're so wide in back I can't fit them between my neck and the airplane seat without my head on my chest. I tried orienting it differently and cutting out some of the foam, but finally left it in a hotel room.
customer_reviews.author: riselikethemoon

customer_reviews.title: I've used this for a few trips and also keep ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a few trips and also keep it at home, on a chair for neck support. so far, no wear or tear. I can remove the outside and throw it into the washer without issue. the memory foam provides enough support and the microfiber is soft and retains warmth.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Way too soft
customer_reviews.text: It was way too soft and I was hoping for something with firmness.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rice

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Enabler
customer_reviews.text: This thing helped me sleep on my overnight flight across country. I usually can't sleep on planes but this was amazing. I also took out the extra padding in the back, as with it it propped me up from the seat too far.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Foam is great quality, but needs sturdier neck support
customer_reviews.text: It's not as comfortable as I thought. You can't really tilt your head to the side as the thing slides out. I'm looking for something that will be a snug fit in my neck so I can roll my head back, left or right and not have to re-adjust the thing. It probably works better than 85% of the products out there though.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is great for travel
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great for travel! It does decrease in firmness over time, but I take it with me every time I fly. My boyfriend always wants to borrow when we are flying because of the support that it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Love

customer_reviews.title: Great Neck Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy pillows like this for traveling but I have a friend that just had brain surgery and will be in a hospital for a long time. He just didn't seem that comfortable with the standard hospital pillows. I purchased this neck pillow for him and it helped a lot. Very comfortable and easy to mold around your neck. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: PFranco

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow to replace an old microbead travel pillow before a long-haul trip, and was thrilled with the quality and comfort! It's just the right level of support for me, and holds up even when stuffed awkwardly into luggage. After dragging it around the world, it still looks almost new, and I am not nice to my carry-ons!
customer_reviews.author: NefariousMango

customer_reviews.title: Does not wrap around neck,m. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This neck pillow is very shallow and does not wrap around my entire neck, which makes it very awkward and uncomfortable. I think I'm going to return it. I'm very disappointed because my trip is in 2 days and I don't have time to order a different one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Used for our 9 hour flight to Europe, Worked great, soft, plush, & comfortable. It also helped to keep my neck warm. Easy to squish in bag & provide a plush place to prop my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kurbz

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other reviewers, I found this pillow to be too much. The memory foam is too firm and large and it was difficult to get and stay comfortable. The foam would work great if you were laying down, but it is not so great when sitting because it pushes against your neck.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Kind of Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I thought the pillows would have been more firmer :-/
customer_reviews.author: Raine

customer_reviews.title: good fit.
customer_reviews.text: It got it in the mail like lightning. Its is stiffer than I expected it to be. The material is soft though and it supports my neck really well. not to mention its pretty comfortable to rest my cheek on. Over all I am very pleased with it. I have not washed it yet so I cant report on the wear of it.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Travel Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my 11 hour flight. Normally I can't sleep on a plane, because I can't find a comfortable spot for my head and often end up with neck pains. I slept 8 hours each way. The strap was also very handy - running through security, and getting on/off plane, it made it easy to grab and go.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: UNCOMFORTABLE AND PAINFUL
customer_reviews.text: They are bigger than what the website says and are way too uncomfortable. My family and I are having neck pains after using the gray ones. Do not get these gray ones. The blue ones are good (listed as the same size) and comfortable. Buy the blue ones instead.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: The neck pillow is very comfortable. I use it watching tv when I'm in my recliner. It keeps my head at a good position. I love the blue color too..
customer_reviews.author: Sleepycat

customer_reviews.title: Tried many other models and this one is excellent. As an added note
customer_reviews.text: Tried many other models and this one is excellent. As an added note, I have another one just to be used as a pillow. I used to get neck pain now with this it keeps me from twisting it while sleeping. Try this at your own risk or consult your medicine doctor. It works for me!
customer_reviews.author: CSI GROUP

customer_reviews.title: Found it more comfortable to put it in the front to rest my ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this for hours to sleep on a 14 hr flight to Taipei and then a 16 hour flight from India back to the states. Found it more comfortable to put it in the front to rest my neck verses behind the head as it is quite firm.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as others but not too bad for the price
customer_reviews.author: Haley Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Not a free return
customer_reviews.text: The neck pillow itself is okay- a little bit big for my liking. I was pretty disappointed that when I went to return it that there was a charge associated with shipping it back. It's probably on me for not reading the fine print, but just wanted to make other buyers aware.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: If you travel, definitely invest in one of these.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my best friend for Christmas with a travel journal and she absolutely loves it. She went on a huge roadtrip with her family and actually used it in the car the entire drive! It is super comfortable and it doesn't have the weird memory-foam smell that most products have when fresh out of the packaging! Great product, great price, perfect gift :)
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We don't use it for travel, Connie sleeps with it every night watching TV
customer_reviews.author: William E. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: I love being able to fold this up into a ball ...
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to fold this up into a ball - this became incredibly useful especially in comparison with my girlfriend's non-memory foam pillow she used when we were traveling recently. Perfect for packing.
customer_reviews.author: nimm45

customer_reviews.title: not enough side of the neck support
customer_reviews.text: The pillow splayed open and not enough support on the sides when it's sides spread out instead of hugging your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Gilchrist

customer_reviews.title: Great to rest your neck!!
customer_reviews.text: My friend wanted this for a long trip and she totally liked it, over all the entire trip she used it and she rested well, plus it has this band to carry it with your luggage! So yes I do recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: MONTYHADES

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! This pillow always goes along on our trips. I liked it so much I ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: LMH01

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Great little travel pillow. Bought two for a trip to Europe and the Holy Land this summer. Sadly, one was left behind at a security checkpoint. I hear they have quite a collection in airport lost and found. The elastic band was great for hauling it on our wheeled luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Mamahoek

customer_reviews.title: Just used it on my most recent trip and enjoyed how firm it was
customer_reviews.text: Just used it on my most recent trip and enjoyed how firm it was. However, on my flight back, my neck began to hurt after some use. The product pushed my head out too much. I think this was a combination of how firm the product is and of how the airplane headrest was leaning more forward (in its default position) on this flight than on my previous flight.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica A. Fortuna

customer_reviews.title: held up great for my flight
customer_reviews.text: It's a neck pillow with a squishable memory foam. Was able to squish it into my carry on, held up great for my flight. I'm a 16.5" neck and this fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy fabric, comfortable memory foam.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is scratcy. The cushion tore when I tried to remove the cover to wash it. But the memory foam is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: NewMidwesterner

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Used it for a 14 hrs flight to Korea. Comfortable soft and conforming. Love the matetial
customer_reviews.author: Richard & Angela

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the standard neck pillow
customer_reviews.text: I got this for an overseas flight for my husband. This one is way better than the one I have since the back portion can be removed and allows your head to sit flat against the back of the seat instead of being pushed forward. I'll definitely get one of these for myself for our next long flight.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the product when I first received it
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the product when I first received it. After a long plane flight, I really grew to like this pillow. Even has used it as a second top pillow.
customer_reviews.author: marichal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: For our recent trip to Florida I bought four of these and gave them as Christmas presents to myself and other going. What a hit! Everyone loved them and in a short time we had them named and much used. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri VC

customer_reviews.title: Never travel without it
customer_reviews.text: The pillow worked very well when I went on my recent trip. It's soft but doesn't lose it's shape. I like how it feels and it gave my neck the support it needed. I not only wore it on the plane but also in the airport while waiting on language and in the rental car.
customer_reviews.author: auseymour

customer_reviews.title: It was a great decision to purchase memory foam
customer_reviews.text: I never travel with out his pillow! It was a great decision to purchase memory foam. Holds up very well and great to sleep on a plane with.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great price! But needs more support
customer_reviews.text: Great price! But needs more support, material too squishy. Also I AM A SMALL GIRL WITH A VERY SMALL NECK, FITS ME DOES NIT A MAN/my husband! For the price though a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Fomitcheva
